Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

 Galvatron shot some final blasts of cannon energy and his matrix of War shot 
of a great black beam. He aimed it trying to cancel out his beam but it 
missed they passed by eachother. Galvatron looked in horror as the beam 
incenerated his body inch by inch starting at his feet. He cried out. "Ill be 
back...I always come back!" he incenerated only leaveing the matrox of War 
and Galvatron's spark inside it. It seemed to inplode on itself and 
disappeared into nothingness.
OCC: I wish to reserve the character Galvatron and his matrix of War thank 
you. This is my goodbye. Playing in this rpg has been great. I hope you all 
have fun and I will see you soon. Go alliance kick some decepticon butt.

--part1_39.117a969f.27d52df9_boundary
